circumstances: Judith May was reported missing from her home at 312 Greengairs Road, Greengairs. She was last seen near a parked vehicle close to the premises by a colleague of her father. circumstances: Judith May, an 11-year-old from Cambridge, was reported missing from her home at 312 Greengairs Road. According to her brother, Judith had recently come to terms with her LGBTQ+ identity, a personal revelation that she had struggled to express openly. On the morning of her disappearance, her family noticed her absence, but there was no note or any indication of where she might have gone. Kevin Gilbert, a family acquaintance, mentioned seeing her the day before, seemingly contemplative but not distressed. The lack of communication and departure without a note led to concerns. Police traced her steps around the neighborhood and after several tense hours, they found Judith safe but emotionally overwhelmed, hiding in a nearby park. She was reunited with her family and is now receiving support.
